perturbation.original_text: Within thirty (30) days of the Methylotroph (or re-engineered Methylotroph) demonstrating such production levels of succinic acid, Bioamber will cease any further funding and/or other support for the BRI Project. Further Bioamber will require that any unexpended funds received from Bioamber be utilized for a project other than the BRI Project.
perturbation.changed_text: Within a reasonable timeframe of the Methylotroph (or re-engineered Methylotroph) demonstrating such production levels of succinic acid, Bioamber should consider ceasing further funding and/or support for the BRI Project. Further, Bioamber will suggest that any unexpended funds received from Bioamber be utilized for a project other than the BRI Project.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'thirty (30) days' to 'reasonable timeframe' introduces ambiguity, as 'reasonable' is subjective. Replacing 'will cease' with 'should consider ceasing' weakens the obligation, making it discretionary. Furthermore, 'will require' is changed to 'will suggest' further making compliance uncertain and not mandatory.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Law (General Contract Principles regarding Clear and Enforceable Obligations)
perturbation.location: Amendment To the Development Agreement, A.

perturbation.original_text: In order to enable such conversion, Bioamber will put in place agreements with the owners/operators of the Sarnia Plant that will enable Bioamber to require such conversion of the Sarnia Plant to solely use CB1 for the manufacture of succinic acid as described above.
perturbation.changed_text: In order to potentially enable such conversion, Bioamber will attempt to put in place agreements with the owners/operators of the Sarnia Plant that may allow Bioamber to request such conversion of the Sarnia Plant to generally use CB1 for the manufacture of succinic acid as described above.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'enable' and 'will' are substituted to introduce ambiguity. Replacing 'enable' with 'potentially enable' makes the outcome uncertain. Changing 'will put in place' to 'will attempt to put in place' introduces a weaker obligation, and 'require' is softened to 'request.' 'Solely' is changed to 'generally' creating uncertainty of the degree of which CB1 should be used.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Law (General Contract Principles regarding Clear and Enforceable Obligations)
perturbation.location: Amendment To the Development Agreement, B. New Section 13.10

perturbation.original_text: Bioamber shall use best efforts to obtain regulatory approvals for the use of the CB1 Strain in all countries where Bioamber and/or a Bioamber licensee are using any strain other than the CB1 strain for the production of succinic acid and/or salts thereof. Additionally, Bioamber shall use best efforts to scale up the CB1 Strain and fermentation protocols utilizing the CB1 Strain.
perturbation.changed_text: Bioamber will endeavor to explore obtaining regulatory approvals for the use of the CB1 Strain in countries where Bioamber and/or a Bioamber licensee are using any strain other than the CB1 strain for the production of succinic acid and/or salts thereof. Additionally, Bioamber may explore scaling up the CB1 Strain and fermentation protocols utilizing the CB1 Strain.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall use best efforts' to 'will endeavor to explore' significantly weakens the obligation. Replacing 'shall use best efforts' with 'may explore' makes the scale-up discretionary and introducing uncertainty.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Law (General Contract Principles regarding Clear and Enforceable Obligations)
perturbation.location: Amendment To the Commercial License, A. Section 5.9
